## markdown-magic-utils package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [asciiDirectoryTree(path, rootName)](./markdown-magic-utils.asciidirectorytree.md) | Generates an ASCII string representation of a directory tree. |
|  [asciiTree(tree)](./markdown-magic-utils.asciitree.md) | Generates an ASCII string representation of a tree. |
|  [bold(text)](./markdown-magic-utils.bold.md) | Surrounds the given text with bold signs |
|  [cmdOutput(options)](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutput.md) | Executes the specified command and returns its STDOUT and STDERR outputs as a string. |
|  [codeBlock(code, lang)](./markdown-magic-utils.codeblock.md) | Surrounds the given string with a Markdown code block. |
|  [getDirTree(fsPath)](./markdown-magic-utils.getdirtree.md) | Recursively search for content in a given directory. |
|  [image(src, altText)](./markdown-magic-utils.image.md) | Given an image URL, generates a Markdown image tag |
|  [link(url, text)](./markdown-magic-utils.link.md) | Given a text and an URL, generates a Markdown link |
|  [rushDependencyGraph(options)](./markdown-magic-utils.rushdependencygraph.md) | Generates a dependency tree of every project in a Rush monorepo |
|  [rushProjects(options)](./markdown-magic-utils.rushprojects.md) | List the projects of a Rush monorepo with bullet-points |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CmdOutputOptions](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutputoptions.md) | Options of the [cmdOutput()](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutput.md) command. |
|  [RushDependencyGraphOptions](./markdown-magic-utils.rushdependencygraphoptions.md) | Options of the [rushDependencyGraph()](./markdown-magic-utils.rushdependencygraph.md) function |
|  [RushProjectsOptions](./markdown-magic-utils.rushprojectsoptions.md) | Options of the [rushProjects()](./markdown-magic-utils.rushprojects.md) function |
|  [TreeNode](./markdown-magic-utils.treenode.md) | A tree node with optional children. |
